name: Destination Unidentified
description:
You arrive at your local train station, ticket in hand. 

You are here to take an unusual journey, on an unknown train, to an unidentified destination.

Decide what you will bring with you on your journey. Alongside any personal belongings, you will need your ticket, a standard deck of playing cards and something to record your experiences (such as a journal or sketchbook).

Whichever train arrives next will be the one you need to take.
